ChatGPT 可用于脑肿瘤的术前 MRI 诊断随着人工智能的进步，其在现实世界应用中的用途和能力不断达到新的高度，甚至可能超越人类的专业知识https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/ChatGPT-can-be-useful-for-preoperative-MRI-diagnosis-of-brain-tumors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/ChatGPT-can-be-useful-for-preoperative-MRI-diagnosis-of-brain-tumors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bca2b75d-5b2c-47dd-b3e2-f46bebed79da Tue, 01 Oct 2024 11:05:02 -0400 ChatGPT can be useful for preoperative MRI diagnosis of brain tumors
BICAN 发布首个主要数据BRAIN Initiative® 细胞图谱网络 (BICAN) 发布了第一个主要数据，标志着绘制整个人类大脑的雄心勃勃的努力的一个重要里程碑。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/BICAN-launches-first-major-data-release.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/BICAN-launches-first-major-data-release.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=91d90118-b39e-43e2-8660-762abc9e2367 Tue, 01 Oct 2024 10:59:44 -0400 BICAN launches first major data release

深部脑刺激有望改善受伤后手臂和手的功能匹兹堡大学医学院的研究人员今天在《自然通讯》杂志上报告说，深部脑刺激可能会立即改善因创伤性脑损伤或中风而减弱的手臂和手的力量和功能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/Deep-brain-stimulation-shows-promise-for-improving-arm-and-hand-function-after-injury.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/Deep-brain-stimulation-shows-promise-for-improving-arm-and-hand-function-after-injury.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=170879dc-ca7d-410c-b73f-bb721e19350e Tue, 01 Oct 2024 10:55:09 -0400 Deep brain stimulation shows promise for improving arm and hand function after injury
动脉粥样硬化进展与无症状个体死亡风险增加相关由西奈山富斯特心脏医院研究人员领导的一项新研究显示，没有症状的人的动脉粥样硬化进展与任何原因死亡的风险独立相关，该研究于 9 月 30 日发表在《美国学院学报》上心脏病学。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/Atherosclerosis-progression-linked-with-increased-risk-of-death-in-asymptomatic-individuals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/Atherosclerosis-progression-linked-with-increased-risk-of-death-in-asymptomatic-individuals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f8c18034-1b52-4fb0-a799-a4095263a3b1 Tue, 01 Oct 2024 10:49:11 -0400 Atherosclerosis progression associated with increased risk of death in asymptomatic individuals
跨学科项目旨在彻底改变医疗保健数据集成医疗保健不仅仅是看医生；这是团队的努力。但大多数基于患者数据的人工智能驱动技术仅使用医生提供的信息，忽略了护士和康复治疗师的关键输入。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/Interlingual-project-aims-to-revolutionize-health-care-data-integration.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/Intersubjective-project-aims-to-revolutionize-health-care-data-integration.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b91761ea-fed4-42f3-8b74-68367c546476 Tue, 01 Oct 2024 10:40:40 -0400 Interdisciplinary project aims to revolutionize health care data integration

结核病治疗后免疫下降的新机制被发现贝勒医学院和合作机构的研究人员发现了一种导致结核病 (TB) 成功治疗后观察到的免疫反应长期下降的机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/New-mechanism-uncovered-behind-immune-decline-after-tuberculosis-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/New-mechanism-uncovered-behind-immune-decline-after-tuberculosis-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4d4102db-eafe-4727-a71b-c175e94737a5 Tue, 01 Oct 2024 08:20:20 -0400 New mechanism uncovered behind immune decline after tuberculosis treatment
限时饮食可以为患有代谢综合征的成年人带来健康益处在美国，超过三分之一的成年人患有代谢综合征，这是一组显着增加人们患心脏病、中风和 2 型糖尿病风险的疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/Time-restricted-eating-could-offer-health-benefits-to-adults-with-metabolic-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/Time-restricted-eating-could-offer-health-benefits-to-adults-with-metabolic-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=49a5515c-7856-474d-af62-371c3588c9ef Tue, 01 Oct 2024 08:02:16 -0400 Time-restricted eating could offer health benefits to adults with metabolic syndrome
